abilities.desc: After you roll your Action Dice, you may combine two of your numbers into a single, larger number. Then, you may split one of your numbers in half (one rounded up, the other rounded down). You cannot split a 1 - the split number must be 2 or higher.
abilities.trigger: after you roll your action dice

actions.name: Show Off
actions.desc:
Choose X: Move 1; -or- Pull 1 to an enemy you can see; -or- deal 1 damage to an enemy within range; -or- give 1 Burning token to an enemy within range; -or- give 1 Weakness token to an enemy within range; -or- give 1 Fatigue token to an enemy within range; -or- Challenge an enemy within range; -or- push 1 to an enemy within range; -or- gain 1 Iron token; -or- gain 1 Power token; -or- gain 1 Speed token; -or- heal 1; -or- gain Shield 1.
Usable once per turn.
